com.mpagliaro98.mysubscriptions.model

Class Subscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpagliaro98.mysubscriptions.model.Subscription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Subscription value object to store data on an individual subscription.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Subscription

        public Subscription(int id,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    double cost,
                    java.util.Date startDate,
                    java.lang.String note,
                    int rechargeFrequency,
                    Category category,
                    int notifDays)
        Create and initialize all the values of this subscription.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id of this subscription
        name - the name of the subscription
        cost - how much it costs
        startDate - when the subscription first started
        note - any miscellaneous notes
        rechargeFrequency - the frequency at which this subscription is paid for
        category - the category this subscription falls into
        notifDays - the number of days before the next payment date a notification will happen

      • Subscription

        Subscription(int id,
             java.lang.String name,
             double cost,
             java.util.Date startDate,
             java.lang.String note,
             int rechargeFrequency,
             Category category,
             int notifDays,
             ZeroTimeCalendar zeroTimeCalendar)
        Create and initialize all the values of this subscription. Includes an option to specify a calendar for today's date, mostly used for testing.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id of this subscription
        name - the name of the subscription
        cost - how much it costs
        startDate - when the subscription first started
        note - any miscellaneous notes
        rechargeFrequency - the frequency at which this subscription is paid for
        category - the category this subscription falls into
        notifDays - the number of days before the next payment date a notification will happen
        zeroTimeCalendar - a calendar of today's date with the time set to 0:00:00

    • Method Detail

      • regenerateSubInfo

        public void regenerateSubInfo()
        Regenerate each subscription field that isn't directly specified on creation, or needs to be updated after a certain amount of time passes.

      • regenerateSubInfo

        void regenerateSubInfo(ZeroTimeCalendar zeroTimeCalendar)
        Regenerate each subscription field that isn't directly specified on creation, or needs to be updated after a certain amount of time passes.
        Parameters:
        zeroTimeCalendar - a calendar of today's date with the time set to 0:00:00

      • getCostString

        public java.lang.String getCostString(android.content.Context context)
        Get a string representation of the cost based on how cost_format is set. This will use the currency symbol used in the settings, but if that fails, will default to $.
        Parameters:
        context - the current application context, containing the resources that has the cost_format string
        Returns:
        a string representation of the cost

      • getStartDate

        public java.util.Date getStartDate()
        Get the start date of the subscription.
        Returns:
        the start date as a Date object

        Parameters:
        context - the current application context
        Returns:
        the start date as a string

      • getNextPaymentList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> getNextPaymentList()
        Get a list of the future payment dates for this subscription for the next X amount of years, as defined by MAX_YEARS_AHEAD in this class.
        Returns:
        a list of next payment dates

        public java.util.Date getNextNotifDate()
        Get the next date this subscription should be notified.
        Returns:
        the next notification date as a Date object

      • generateNextPaymentDate

        private void generateNextPaymentDate()
        Calculate when the next soonest payment date will be from today, as well as a list of payment dates after that for the next MAX_YEARS_AHEAD years.

      • generateNextPaymentDate

        private void generateNextPaymentDate(ZeroTimeCalendar zeroTimeCalendar)
        Calculate when the next soonest payment date will be from today, as well as a list of payment dates after that for the next MAX_YEARS_AHEAD years.
        Parameters:
        zeroTimeCalendar - a calendar of today's date with the time set to 0:00:00

      • generateNextNotifDate

        private void generateNextNotifDate()
        Generate the next date a notification should occur for this subscription. This should be run after the next payment date is generated. If notifications are set to off for this subscription, the next notification date will be set to null.

      • generateNextNotifDate

        private void generateNextNotifDate(ZeroTimeCalendar zeroTimeCalendar)
        Generate the next date a notification should occur for this subscription. This should be run after the next payment date is generated. If notifications are set to off for this subscription, the next notification date will be set to null.
        Parameters:
        zeroTimeCalendar - a calendar of today's date with the time set to 0:00:00
